actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Resolution providing for printing of 4,500 additional copies of the subcommittee print of the Subcommittee on Consumer Affairs of the Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs entitled "Give Yourself Credit:  Guide to Consumer Credit Laws."

summary.text: Directs the printing of 4,500 additional copies of the subcommittee print of the Subcommittee on Consumer Affairs of the Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs entitled "Give Yourself Credit: Guide to Consumer Credit Laws," for the use of the Subcommittee.

titles.title: Resolution providing for printing of 4,500 additional copies of the subcommittee print of the Subcommittee on Consumer Affairs of the Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs entitled "Give Yourself Credit:  Guide to Consumer Credit Laws."
